
## loading the data 

```{r}
data("testnegdata")

# SELECT THE COLUMNS OF INTEREST FOR THE SIMPLE MODEL
data_of_interest <- testnegdata %>% 
  dplyr::select(real_time_pcr_for_influenza_abafrims, vaccine12mo_yn) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(screen_res = ifelse(real_time_pcr_for_influenza_abafrims == "Neg", 0, 1))
```
